content: ऋध् {c4c} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (ऋध्यति, ऋध्नोति, आनर्ध, आर्धीत्, अर्धितुं, ऋद्ध) ; sometimes {c7c} <ab>P.</ab> (ऋणद्धि) {@--1@} To prosper, flourish, thrive, succeed; नाब्रह्म क्षत्रमृध्नोति <ls>Ms. 9. 322.</ls> {@--2@} To grow, increase (<ab>fig.</ab> also). {@--3@} To cause to succeed, make prosperous. {@--4@} To satisfy, gratify, please, propitiate; <ls>Māl. 5. 29.</ls> {@--5@} To accomplish. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} ईर्त्सति or अर्दिधिषति.
